overview:
Born in Italy, moved to Brazil in 1999. Earned a BS and a PhD in Physics from the University of Rome and Padova. Since 2008 he is CTO and co-founder of Brandsclub, the leading private sales club in Brasil.

Vasco always showed a genuine interest for knowledge in a wide sense. Competitive and challenge oriented, Vasco has been tracing his career through a series of executive positions in start-up and small companies, clearly focusing on technology oriented markets (web, communication, telecom).

The knowledge of 5 languages and the professional and personal acquaintance with many countries in different continents contribute to the natural disposition to a global and transnational view of any business situation in which Vasco is involved.

A sharp business-oriented mindset and a deep technical knowledge, combined with excellent communication skills, make Vasco best suited to play a crucial role in fast moving, technology rich companies, where quick and effective product and service deployment are required.

Mixing the analytical mindset from the scientific educational background with the pragmatic attitude acquired in dealing with very different “real-world” situations, different cultures and different markets, Vasco has proved extremely effective in identifying new business opportunities and setting up strategies to pursue them
